snippet: A new judge was named on Friday to preside over the trial of James (Whitey) Bulger, who faces 19 counts of murder, after another judge was removed over a possible perception of bias.
abstract: Judge Denise J Casper, relatively new to federal bench, is named to preside over trial of Boston crime boss James (Whitey) Bulger, who faces 19 counts of murder, after Judge Richard G Stearns is removed over possible perception of bias.
lead_paragraph: A new judge was named on Friday to preside over the trial of James (Whitey) Bulger, who faces 19 counts of murder, after another judge was removed over a possible perception of bias.
